name: No More Snow
storyline:
Our story begins in a realm far away from ours, hidden within the darkness of an ancient forest.

It’s a calm and cold evening in the town. Joyful children are playing beneath a tall Christmas tree, decorated with sparkling ornaments and glowing lights.

Yet, strange sounds silence the children's laughter. The children scatter in every direction, their hearts pounding, fleeing from the approaching terrors.

Hiding behind the rooftops of the old houses, Krampus' generals, begin to crawl out of the shadows.

At the heart of this horrifying spectacle, Krampus himself lurks atop the church bell tower, giving a sinister gaze downward.

Yet, in this moment of creeping darkness, a sparkle of hope emerges. In the distance, a solitary figure in a red coat steps forward. With one purpose in his mind - to save Christmas from the looming threat of evil.
summary: You control Santa Claus as he fights against Krampus and his mischievous minions. The game features 8 unique levels, an army of monsters, and challenging boss fights. Can you save Christmas and bring peace to the North Pole?
